EmailTemplate.name: 2018.11.28 - BS - Customer Survey.2018.11.28 - Customer Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: $10 in points for your thoughts.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com?utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> We want to hear from you!
Your opinion matters to us.
Help us improve the Business Select experience for you and our other members. Take a quick 10-minute survey and we’ll apply $10 in points to your account to say thank you. Get Started <[[https://{{lead.Survey Link}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
* Please allow 30 days for Grand Rewards points to be added to your account. Limit 10 points per account. Must sign in to your account to redeem your points. Offer valid at grandandtoy.com only. Open to Canadian residents only.
